data.name: Warhammer: Chaosbane - Gold Boost
data.detailed_description: This boost, which is equipped in your inventory, gives you a gold boost each time you pick up loot. That way you get more resources that you can trade with merchants in the game.
data.about_the_game: This boost, which is equipped in your inventory, gives you a gold boost each time you pick up loot. That way you get more resources that you can trade with merchants in the game.
data.short_description: This boost, which is equipped in your inventory, gives you a gold boost each time you pick up loot. That way you get more resources that you can trade with merchants in the game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 7 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-540 or AMD Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD Radeon HD 6870
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3770 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 780 or AMD R9 290
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Soundcard
  • Additional Notes: 64bit Only
